SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: Equipment_Installed_EA
SQLDataSource.Where: mch_code IN (SELECT mch_code FROM (SELECT a.mch_code, NVL(&AO.C_Ea_Customization_Util_API.Get_Identity(a.mch_code, a.contract), '') AS identity, &AO.C_Ea_Customization_Util_API.Get_Contract_Id(a.mch_code, a.contract) AS contract_id FROM &AO.equipment_functional_cfv a WHERE a.part_no is not null AND a.objtype = 'EquipmentFunctional' AND a.operational_status_db = 'IN_OPERATION' AND &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.C_Ea_Customization_Util_API.Get_Contract_Id(a.mch_code, a.contract)) = 'MS') WHERE REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%') AND REPLACE(NVL(&AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(identity), ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%'))
